title: I showered with my mom and things got awkward : r/confessions - Reddit
body: So do what you want to do because that's what we should all do. Instead of what some book or some other person said it isn't okay if you liked it then ask her to help you with the shower again. Just cuz people say it isn't okay it doesn't mean it isn't do what makes you feel good do what makes you happy whatever it may be. 1. r/confessions.
